name: Adith Multilingual Services Private Limited
overview:
Adith Multilingual Services Pvt. Ltd. specializes in translations and integrated services.

They offer a variety of solutions ranging from Translation, Localization, Media Translation, Documentation, Multilingual Desktop Publishing, Voiceover, Transcription, Market Research, Movie Subtitling, Post Production, Graphic Designing, Graphic Designing Services, Web Designing and Web Designing Services, Web Development and Interpretation in various fields and subjects such as technical and non technical (IT, Legal, Medical, Engineering Drawings, Telecommunication, Creative Writing, Research, Patent, Media, Business)
